img_summary: The image features a creature with a humanoid face and a bird-like body, standing in a snowy environment. The creature has a reddish head and chest, white feathers, and appears to be speaking. The text at the bottom of the image reads, "I, the Keeper of the New West, welcome the Destined One!" indicating that the creature is addressing someone, possibly the player or protagonist in the game. The background includes blurred trees and a wintry landscape.
